title: Game-Based Collaborative Learning Course for Improving Algorithmic Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Collaborative game development learning program in smartphone-based mobile LMS environments, aiming to strengthen problem-solving skills for social sector practitioners

learning_goals: Achieve ≥80% proficiency in algorithm design and implementation through game-based tasks
Improve learning engagement by ≥30% by applying Socially Shared Regulated Learning (SSRL) strategies in collaborative environments
Develop and present ≥3 case studies demonstrating practical problem-solving using algorithmic thinking

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
